definition: board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Lasting nearly two hours, Allegro Film's latest reissue is in three sections.

sentences.english: Allegro I was just learning, I was very interested in folk art.
